15825     }
15826     else if (queues.local.length) {
15827       // Only actually dispatch if there is only the op we just (maybe).
15828       if (queues.local.length === 1 && queues.local[0] === op)
15829         this._dispatchLocalOpForAccount(account, op);
15830       // else: we grabbed control flow to avoid the server queue running
15831     }
15832     else if (queues.server.length === 1 && queues.server[0] === op &&
15833              this.online && account.enabled) {
15834       this._dispatchServerOpForAccount(account, op);
15835     }
15836 
15837     return op.longtermId;
15838   },
15839 
15840   waitForAccountOps: function(account, callback) {
15841     var queues = this._opsByAccount[account.id];
15842     if (queues.local.length === 0 &&
15843        (queues.server.length === 0 || !this.online || !account.enabled))
15844       callback();
15845     else
15846       this._opCompletionListenersByAccount[account.id] = callback;
15847   },
15848 
15849   syncFolderList: function(account, callback) {
15850     this._queueAccountOp(
15851       account,
15852       {
15853         type: 'syncFolderList',
15854         longtermId: 'session',
15855         lifecycle: 'do',
15856         localStatus: 'done',
15857         serverStatus: null,
15858         tryCount: 0,
15859         humanOp: 'syncFolderList'
15860       },
15861       callback);
15862   },
15863 
15870   purgeExcessMessages: function(account, folderId, callback) {
15871     this._queueAccountOp(
15872       account,
15873       {
15874         type: 'purgeExcessMessages',
15875         longtermId: 'session',
15876         lifecycle: 'do',
15877         localStatus: null,
15878         serverStatus: 'n/a',
15879         tryCount: 0,
15880         humanOp: 'purgeExcessMessages',
15881         folderId: folderId
15882       },
15883       callback);
15884   },
15885 
15889   downloadMessageBodyReps: function(suid, date, callback) {
15890     var account = this.getAccountForMessageSuid(suid);
15891     this._queueAccountOp(
15892       account,
15893       {
15894         type: 'downloadBodyReps',
15895         longtermId: 'session',
15896         lifecycle: 'do',
15897         localStatus: 'done',
15898         serverStatus: null,
15899         tryCount: 0,
15900         humanOp: 'downloadBodyReps',
15901         messageSuid: suid,
15902         messageDate: date
15903       },
15904       callback
15905     );
15906   },
15907 
15908   downloadBodies: function(messages, options, callback) {
15909     if (typeof(options) === 'function') {
15910       callback = options;
15911       options = null;
15912     }
15913 
15914     var self = this;
15915     var pending = 0;
15916 
15917     function next() {
15918       if (!--pending) {
15919         callback();
15920       }
15921     }
15922     this._partitionMessagesByAccount(messages, null).forEach(function(x) {
15923       pending++;
15924       self._queueAccountOp(
15925         x.account,
15926         {
15927           type: 'downloadBodies',
15928           longtermId: 'session', // don't persist this job.
15929           lifecycle: 'do',
15930           localStatus: 'done',
15931           serverStatus: null,
15932           tryCount: 0,
15933           humanOp: 'downloadBodies',
15934           messages: x.messages,
15935           options: options
15936         },
15937         next
15938       );
15939     });
15940   },
15941 
15951   downloadMessageAttachments: function(messageSuid, messageDate,
15952                                        relPartIndices, attachmentIndices,
15953                                        callback) {
15954     var account = this.getAccountForMessageSuid(messageSuid);
15955     var longtermId = this._queueAccountOp(
15956       account,
15957       {
15958         type: 'download',
15959         longtermId: null,
15960         lifecycle: 'do',
15961         localStatus: null,
15962         serverStatus: null,
15963         tryCount: 0,
15964         humanOp: 'download',
15965         messageSuid: messageSuid,
15966         messageDate: messageDate,
15967         relPartIndices: relPartIndices,
15968         attachmentIndices: attachmentIndices
15969       },
15970       callback);
15971   },
15972 
15973   modifyMessageTags: function(humanOp, messageSuids, addTags, removeTags) {
15974     var self = this, longtermIds = [];
15975     this._partitionMessagesByAccount(messageSuids, null).forEach(function(x) {
15976       var longtermId = self._queueAccountOp(
15977         x.account,
15978         {
15979           type: 'modtags',
15980           longtermId: null,
15981           lifecycle: 'do',
15982           localStatus: null,
15983           serverStatus: null,
15984           tryCount: 0,
15985           humanOp: humanOp,
15986           messages: x.messages,
15987           addTags: addTags,
15988           removeTags: removeTags,
15989           // how many messages have had their tags changed already.
15990           progress: 0,
15991         });
15992       longtermIds.push(longtermId);
15993     });
15994     return longtermIds;
15995   },
15996 
15997   moveMessages: function(messageSuids, targetFolderId) {
15998     var self = this, longtermIds = [],
15999         targetFolderAccount = this.getAccountForFolderId(targetFolderId);
16000     this._partitionMessagesByAccount(messageSuids, null).forEach(function(x) {
16001       // TODO: implement cross-account moves and then remove this constraint
16002       // and instead schedule the cross-account move.
16003       if (x.account !== targetFolderAccount)
16004         throw new Error('cross-account moves not currently supported!');
16005       var longtermId = self._queueAccountOp(
16006         x.account,
16007         {
16008           type: 'move',
16009           longtermId: null,
16010           lifecycle: 'do',
16011           localStatus: null,
16012           serverStatus: null,
16013           tryCount: 0,
16014           humanOp: 'move',
16015           messages: x.messages,
16016           targetFolder: targetFolderId,
16017         });
16018       longtermIds.push(longtermId);
16019     });
16020     return longtermIds;
16021   },
16022 
16023   deleteMessages: function(messageSuids) {
16024     var self = this, longtermIds = [];
16025     this._partitionMessagesByAccount(messageSuids, null).forEach(function(x) {
16026       var longtermId = self._queueAccountOp(
16027         x.account,
16028         {
16029           type: 'delete',
16030           longtermId: null,
16031           lifecycle: 'do',
16032           localStatus: null,
16033           serverStatus: null,
16034           tryCount: 0,
16035           humanOp: 'delete',
16036           messages: x.messages
16037         });
16038       longtermIds.push(longtermId);
16039     });
16040     return longtermIds;
16041   },
16042 
16043   appendMessages: function(folderId, messages) {
16044     var account = this.getAccountForFolderId(folderId);
16045     var longtermId = this._queueAccountOp(
16046       account,
16047       {
16048         type: 'append',
16049         longtermId: null,
16050         lifecycle: 'do',
16051         localStatus: 'done',
16052         serverStatus: null,
16053         tryCount: 0,
16054         humanOp: 'append',
16055         messages: messages,
16056         folderId: folderId,
16057       });
16058     return [longtermId];
16059   },
16060 
16064   saveDraft: function(account, existingNamer, header, body, callback) {
16065     this._queueAccountOp(
16066       account,
16067       {
16068         type: 'saveDraft',
16069         longtermId: null,
16070         lifecycle: 'do',
16071         localStatus: null,
16072         serverStatus: 'n/a', // local-only currently
16073         tryCount: 0,
16074         humanOp: 'saveDraft',
16075         existingNamer: existingNamer,
16076         header: header,
16077         body: body
16078       },
16079       callback
16080     );
16081   },
16082 
16083   deleteDraft: function(account, messageNamer, callback) {
16084     this._queueAccountOp(
16085       account,
16086       {
16087         type: 'deleteDraft',
16088         longtermId: null,
16089         lifecycle: 'do',
16090         localStatus: null,
16091         serverStatus: 'n/a', // local-only currently
16092         tryCount: 0,
16093         humanOp: 'deleteDraft',
16094         messageNamer: messageNamer
16095       },
16096       callback
16097     );
16098 
16099   },
16100 
16143   createFolder: function(accountId, parentFolderId, folderName,
16144                          containOnlyOtherFolders, callback) {
16145     var account = this.getAccountForAccountId(accountId);
16146     var longtermId = this._queueAccountOp(
16147       account,
16148       {
16149         type: 'createFolder',
16150         longtermId: null,
16151         lifecycle: 'do',
16152         localStatus: null,
16153         serverStatus: null,
16154         tryCount: 0,
16155         humanOp: 'createFolder',
16156         parentFolderId: parentFolderId,
16157         folderName: folderName,
16158         containOnlyOtherFolders: containOnlyOtherFolders
16159       },
16160       callback);
16161     return [longtermId];
16162   },
16163 
16168   undoMutation: function(longtermIds) {
16169     for (var i = 0; i < longtermIds.length; i++) {
16170       var longtermId = longtermIds[i],
16171           account = this.getAccountForFolderId(longtermId), // (it's fine)
16172           queues = this._opsByAccount[account.id];
16173 
16174       for (var iOp = 0; iOp < account.mutations.length; iOp++) {
16175         var op = account.mutations[iOp];
16176         if (op.longtermId === longtermId) {
16177           // There is nothing to do if we have already processed the request or
16178           // or the op has already been fully undone.
16179           if (op.lifecycle === 'undo' || op.lifecycle === 'undone') {
16180             continue;
16181           }
16182 
16183           // Queue an undo operation if we're already done.
16184           if (op.lifecycle === 'done') {
16185             op.lifecycle = 'undo';
16186             this._queueAccountOp(account, op);
16187             continue;
16188           }
16189           // else op.lifecycle === 'do'
16190 
16191           // If we have not yet started processing the operation, we can
16192           // simply remove the operation from the local queue.
16193           var idx = queues.local.indexOf(op);
16194           if (idx !== -1) {
16195               op.lifecycle = 'undone';
16196               queues.local.splice(idx, 1);
16197               continue;
16198           }
16199           // (the operation must have already been run locally, which means
16200           // that at the very least we need to local_undo, so queue it.)
16201 
16202           op.lifecycle = 'undo';
16203           this._queueAccountOp(account, op);
16204         }
16205       }
16206     }
16207   },
16208 
16210 };
16211 
16212 var LOGFAB = exports.LOGFAB = $log.register($module, {
16213   MailUniverse: {
16214     type: $log.ACCOUNT,
16215     events: {
16216       configCreated: {},
16217       configMigrating: {},
16218       configLoaded: {},
16219       createAccount: { type: true, id: false },
16220       opDeferred: { type: true, id: false },
16221       opTryLimitReached: { type: true, id: false },
16222       opGaveUp: { type: true, id: false },
16223       opMooted: { type: true, id: false },
16224     },
16225     TEST_ONLY_events: {
16226       configCreated: { config: false },
16227       configMigrating: { lazyCarryover: false },
16228       configLoaded: { config: false, accounts: false },
16229       createAccount: { name: false },
16230     },
16231     errors: {
16232       badAccountType: { type: true },
16233       opCallbackErr: { type: false },
16234       opInvariantFailure: {},
16235     },
16236   },
16237 });
16238 
16239 }); // end define
16240 ;
16241 define('mailapi/worker-setup',
16242   [
16243     './shim-sham',
16244     './worker-router',
16245     './mailbridge',
16246     './mailuniverse',
16247     'exports'
16248   ],
16249   function(
16250     $shim_setup,
16251     $router,
16252     $mailbridge,
16253     $mailuniverse,
16254     exports
16255   ) {
16256 'use strict';
16257 
16258 var routerBridgeMaker = $router.registerInstanceType('bridge');
16259 
16260 var bridgeUniqueIdentifier = 0;
16261 function createBridgePair(universe) {
16262   var uid = bridgeUniqueIdentifier++;
16263 
16264   var TMB = new $mailbridge.MailBridge(universe);
16265   var routerInfo = routerBridgeMaker.register(function(data) {
16266     TMB.__receiveMessage(data.msg);
16267   });
16268   var sendMessage = routerInfo.sendMessage;
16269 
16270   TMB.__sendMessage = function(msg) {
16271     TMB._LOG.send(msg.type, msg);
16272     sendMessage(null, msg);
16273   };
16274 
16275   // Let's say hello to the main thread in order to generate a
16276   // corresponding mailAPI.
16277   TMB.__sendMessage({
16278     type: 'hello',
16279     config: universe.exposeConfigForClient()
16280   });
16281 }
16282 
16283 var universe = null;
16284 
16285 function onUniverse() {
16286   createBridgePair(universe);
16287   console.log("Mail universe/bridge created and notified!");
16288 }
16289 
16290 var sendControl = $router.registerSimple('control', function(data) {
16291   var args = data.args;
16292   switch (data.cmd) {
16293     case 'hello':
16294       universe = new $mailuniverse.MailUniverse(onUniverse, args[0]);
16295       break;
16296 
16297     case 'online':
16298     case 'offline':
16299       universe._onConnectionChange(args[0]);
16300       break;
16301   }
16302 });
16303 sendControl('hello');
16304 
16306 
16307 });
16308 
16309 require(["mailapi/worker-setup"]);
 全て データ構造 ネームスペース ファイル 関数 変数 型定義 列挙型 列挙型の値 フレンド マクロ定義

  • FxOS Code Readingに対してSat Oct 19 2013 00:55:36に生成されました。 1.7.6.1
